riddle: What is the worst vegetable to have on a ship?
Flat as a leaf. Round as a ring. Has two eyes, can't see a thing. What is it?
What goes up when the rain comes down?
You pick it. You peel the outside. You cook the inside. You eat the outside, and throw away the inside. What am I?
There is a clerk at the butcher shop, he is five feet ten inches tall, and he wears size 13 sneakers. He has a wife and 2 kids. What does he weigh?
Forward I am heavy. Backwards I am not. What am I?
What word contains all of the twenty six letters?
What 8 letter has -kst in the middle, in the beginning and in the end?

I sizzle like bacon, I'm made with an egg. I have plenty of backbone, but not a good leg. I peel layers like an onion, but still remain whole. I can be long like a flagpole, yet I fit in a hole. What am I?
I have many teeth, If I break one I can't work properly, I have many siblings but none look like me What am I?
What has a head and a tail but no body?
